comment:
>>37809701
The Crimson Guardians, though smaller, are allegedly the strongest guild by player level and skill. Their leader is called Liza; you don't know her and have only seen one of their members in passing, but according to a man you met in the town's tavern, she is equipped with the only Celestial Artifact created in Averron so far. They're the only guild that has a "strict application process".
name: Anonymous
